about_me.des: I am an electrical and computer science engineer working in the Visual Computing Lab of the Information Technologies Institute at the Centre of Research and Technology Hellas. My research interests are mainly in 3D computer vision and graphics for augmented and virtual reality, including 3D human reconstruction in tele-immersive / holoportation settings. I am also indulging myself into Deep Learning.

career.sdu_a: Visual Computing Lab, Information Technologies Institute, Centre for Research and Technology Hellas
career.sdu_b: Electrical Engineering Faculty, Aristotle University Thessaloniki
career.sdu_b_desc: Bachelor degree in Electrical and Computer Science Engineering
